mapper.sql: select a.*, cat.label "cat_label", u.label "uid_label", g.label "gid_label" from org a left join partycat cat on a.cat = cat.id left join "user" u on a.uid=u.id left join "group" g on a.gid=g.id

mapper.insert: insert into org( label, description, priority, flags, state, uid, gid, mode, acl, props, cat, birthday, locale, timezone, supplier, customer, subject, address1, address2, tel, size, taxid ) values( #{label},#{description}, #{priority}, #{flags}, #{state}, #{ownerUser.id}, #{ownerGroup.id}, #{accessMode}, #{acl}, #{properties.jsonForm}::jsonb, #{category.id}, #{birthday}, #{langTag}, #{timeZoneId}, #{supplier}, #{customer}, #{subject}, #{contact.address1}, #{contact.address2}, #{contact.tel}, #{size}, #{taxId} ) returning id; --
